definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
the moth flies into the flame/fatal attraction
lit. like a moth flying into the fire (idiom); fig. to choose a path to certain destruction

pinyin: Suo3 duo1 ma3 yu3 E2 mo2 la1

definition: beautiful eyebrow and white teeth (idiom); lovely young woman

sentences.english: And the LORD said, Because the cry of Sodom and Gomorrah is great, and because their sin is very grievous;
sentences.chinese: 耶和华说，所多玛和蛾摩拉的罪恶甚重，声闻于我。

sentences.english: And tradition identifies this as the site of Sodom and Gomorrah.
sentences.chinese: 传说认为这里是索多玛城和蛾摩拉城旧址。

sentences.english: The yellow tortrix, Acleris fimbriana is an economically important orchard insect in northern Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 黄斑长翅卷蛾是我国北方果园的重要害虫。

sentences.english: These include oysters, clams, mussels and whelks.
sentences.chinese: 这些海产包括牡蛎，文蛤，贻贝和蛾螺。

sentences.english: Scanning electron microscope image of the compound eye of a noctuid moth.
sentences.chinese: 扫描电子显微镜图像的复眼的夜蛾蛾。

sentences.english: Moths have eaten holes in my wool coat.
sentences.chinese: 蛾已经在我的羊毛衫上蛀蚀了一些小洞。

sentences.english: No one could give King Moth a competent pair of wings, but themselves.
sentences.chinese: 没有谁能够施舍给帝王蛾一双奋飞的翅膀。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, lab rearing of the pest was tested.
sentences.chinese: 同时，探索了松实小卷蛾的室内饲养方法。
诺亚毁灭了所多玛与蛾摩拉。

sentences.english: The main dominant species was Olethreutes leucaspis Meyrick.
sentences.chinese: 主要优势种是三角新小卷蛾。

sentences.english: The collection includes butterflies and moths from all over theworld.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶馆里面收藏了世界各地的蝴蝶和蛾类。

sentences.english: This moth's ear is tuned in to the bat's ultrasonic squeak .
sentences.chinese: 这种蛾的耳朵能收听到蝙蝠的超音速的尖叫声。

sentences.english: The study aimed to control Cossus orientalis gaede with cornus officinalis as host by biological pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 研究生物农药防治以山茱萸为寄主的芳香木蠹蛾。
